thread.title: Two Pharmaceutical Industry Veterans Join the Eagle Leadership Team

author: cnbc.com
title: Two Pharmaceutical Industry Veterans Join the Eagle Leadership Team
text:
Former FDA regulatory scientist, Dr. David Hussong, becomes Chief Technical Officer, as Mary “Mick” Moriva is named Vice President of Quality Assurance/Regulatory Affairs
HOUSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Eagle , an FDA-registered and ISO-certified analytical laboratory, has expanded its leadership team with the addition of Chief Technical Officer David Hussong, PhD , and Vice President of Quality Assurance/Regulatory Affairs Mary “Mick” Moriva . Based in Houston, Eagle provides science-based solutions to 503A compounding pharmacies, 503B outsourcing facilities and pharmaceutical manufacturers worldwide.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180207005270/en/
David Hussong, PhD, Eagle Chief Technical Officer (Photo: Business Wire)
As Chief Technical Officer, Dr. Hussong will assist in scientific and regulatory matters for analytical testing of products, as well as provide technical and cGMP consulting services. As Vice President of Quality Assurance/Regulatory Affairs, Moriva will oversee and provide strategic direction to the quality unit, ensuring that Eagle exceeds customers' requirements. Additionally she will be a valuable member of the cGMP and pharmacy audit consulting team.
“Adding David and Mick to the Eagle team solidifies our commitment to provide customers with both expert consulting services for audits and inspections and quality testing services to ensure compliance,” said Eagle President Ross Caputo, PhD. ”The variety and level of services Eagle offers is very rare. Their world-class expertise provides immense value to our customers today and positions us for continued growth in the long term.”
Dr. Hussong joins Eagle with more than 40 years of experience, including 30 years with the FDA as a regulatory scientist. Most recently, he was a consultant to the pharmaceutical industry. His research has been focused on studies of microbial recovery and detection methods. Dr. Hussong is also the current chair of the USP Microbiology Expert Committee.
Moriva brings extensive experience to the Eagle team. During her 20+ years in the pharmaceutical/medical device/biotech industries, she led the development and implementation of corporate strategic quality goals, quality systems and worldwide compliance activities. She also has more than 19 years of consulting experience responding to the needs of customers in these industries, as well as the needs of compounding pharmacies and outsourcing facilities.
About EAGLE
Established in 2004, Eagle is an FDA-registered and ISO-certified laboratory that provides science-based solutions to the pharmaceutical industry, 503A compounding pharmacies, and 503B outsourcing facilities worldwide. Eagle’s services include: analytical and microbiological testing of products to help ensure compliance; providing expert consulting services to prepare for audits and inspections; and working with researchers on clinical trials and investigational new drugs (INDs). State-of-the-art equipment, combined with the experience and knowledge of its team, makes Eagle the choice for analytical and microbiological testing for sterility, bacterial endotoxins, beyond-use-date determination, potency, container-closure integrity, anti-microbial effectiveness and more.
